Test Name: GATA2 Full Gene Analysis via Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants across the full GATA2 gene for accurate diagnostic assessment of GATA2-related conditions.
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina sequencer), analysis server/computer, bioinformatics tools including FastQC, Trimmomatic, BWA-MEM, SAMtools, Picard, GATK, Annovar, and VEP
